cgcloud__Condition_Search_Rule__c.name: cgcloud__Condition_Search_Rule__c
cgcloud__Condition_Search_Rule__c.description: Holds the attributes of Condition Search Rule.

cgcloud__Account_Dimension__c.description: Defines the account hierarchical node to start condition search from.

cgcloud__Condition_Anchor__c.description: The source table from which the conditions need to be searched from.

cgcloud__Condition_Search_Group__c.description: Reference to the Condition Search Group object.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user specific language.

cgcloud__Dimension_Priority__c.description: Defines the search order of the different dimensions.

cgcloud__Measure_Code__c.description: Holds the code for the condition type of the conditions records to be retrieved.

cgcloud__Product_Dimension__c.description: Defines the product hierarchical node to start condition search from.

cgcloud__Search_Type__c.description: Defines the strategy to be used for search conditions across product and account hierarchies.
